definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
pigeon/dove/various birds of the family Columbidae
Flying Pigeon (famous bicycle brand, made in Tianjin since 1936)
(bird species of China) rock dove (Columba livia)
(bird species of China) yellow-eyed pigeon (Columba eversmanni)
(bird species of China) hill pigeon (Columba rupestris)
(bird species of China) common wood pigeon (Columba palumbus)
(bird species of China) stock dove (Columba oenas)
(bird species of China) ashy wood pigeon (Columba pulchricollis)
(bird species of China) pale-capped pigeon (Columba punicea)

sentences.english: Millions of pigeons are bred for racing purposes.
sentences.chinese: 數以百萬計的鴿子都是職業賽鴿。

sentences.english: If the ranking of homing pigeons is not full, prize of other rankings shall be equally allocated by winning pigeons.
sentences.chinese: 如歸巢獲名次未滿剩餘名次獎金由獲獎鴿均分。

sentences.english: One yearling cock was Old Bird of the Year winning three equal first etc.
sentences.chinese: 一隻一歲鴿獲得年度老鴿，贏得了三個同樣的冠軍。

sentences.english: On a wall-mounted menu: "Roasted sucking pigeon".
sentences.chinese: 還有一家餐廳牆上的菜單裏有“烤吮吸鴿”。

sentences.english: A few beautiful, "Aconitum", small white eyes, pigeons major 500 a pair.
sentences.chinese: 幾隻漂亮的“烏頭”，細白眼皮，鴿主要500一對。

sentences.english: The visibility of racing pigeons undoubtedly is one of the biggest taboo.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的能見度對賽鴿來講無疑是一種最大的忌諱。

sentences.english: If there is no homing pigeon within the valid date, the prize shall be equally allocated by participation pigeons.
sentences.chinese: 如有效期內無鴿歸巢則獎金由決賽鴿均分。

sentences.english: Thou stock-dove whose echo resounds through the glen.
sentences.chinese: 鷗鴿啊，你的迴音穿過山谷。

sentences.english: Several purple ring, are small pigeons, pigeon key 200 a pair.
sentences.chinese: 幾隻紫環，都是小鴿子，鴿主要200一對。

sentences.english: Shiny red and bronze over a dove-grey base.
sentences.chinese: 在鴿灰色基調上閃耀着紅色青銅光澤。

sentences.english: A few good first type dove, yellow bike has a very good drum forehead.
sentences.chinese: 幾隻頭型鴿不錯，自行車有個黃的鼓腦門挺好。

sentences.english: First type dove a few good, particularly that on the yellow bar.
sentences.chinese: 幾隻頭型鴿不錯，特別是那對黃槓。

sentences.english: Rock Pigeon landing in slow motion.

definition: pigeon/dove/various birds of the family Columbidae
